meanings.definition: The act of playing a harp.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the beautiful harpings at the concert.
meanings.sent2: The gentle harpings filled the room with soothing music.
meanings.sent3: The magical harpings seemed to transport her to a different world.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced gracefully over the strings, creating enchanting harpings.
meanings.sent5: The ethereal harpings echoed through the hall, captivating everyone.

meanings.sent1: His constant harpings about the weather were starting to annoy everyone.
meanings.sent2: She grew tired of his endless harpings about the same topic.
meanings.sent3: Despite his harpings, she remained unfazed and continued with her work.
meanings.sent4: The harpings of her colleagues only fueled her determination to succeed.
meanings.sent5: The never-ending harpings in the office made it hard to focus on anything else.
